name: Sheldongame
0:
”Alexa open sheldon game”
”Alexa launch sheldon game”
”Alexa let's play sheldon game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sheldon game
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The game is an expansion on the game Rock, Paper, Scissors. Each player picks a variable and reveals it at the same time. The winner is the one who defeats the others. In a tie, the process is repeated until a winner is found.

Scissors cuts Paper
Paper covers Rock
Rock crushes Lizard
Lizard poisons Spock
Spock smashes Scissors
Scissors decapitates Lizard
Lizard eats Paper
Paper disproves Spock
Spock vaporizes Rock
(and as it always has) Rock crushes Scissors
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
